com.github.pwittchen.weathericonview

Class WeatherIconView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.TextView
        • com.github.pwittchen.weathericonview.WeatherIconView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener

    public class WeatherIconView
extends android.widget.TextView
    Weather Icon View allows you to create Weather Icon for your Android application It's based on Erik Flowers project located at: https://github.com/erikflowers/weather-icons This project is open-source and can be found at: https://github.com/pwittchen/WeatherIconView

    • Method Detail

      • setIconResource

        public void setIconResource(java.lang.String iconCode)
        sets weather icon basing on String resources Icons are created from weather-icons TTF font by Erik Flowers Full icons reference can be found at: http://erikflowers.github.io/weather-icons/
        Parameters:
        iconCode - icon code located in res/values/strings.xml file

      • setIconSize

        public void setIconSize(int size)
        sets icon size
        Parameters:
        size - icon size as an integer; default size is equal to 100

      • setIconColor

        public void setIconColor(int colorResource)
        sets icon color resource
        Parameters:
        colorResource - color resource - eg. Color.RED or any custom color; default is Color.BLACK
